sentences.sentence: He completed his paediatric residency at Stanford University Hospital.
sentences.translation: 他在斯坦福大学附属医院完成了儿科实习。

sentences.sentence: And 21% of children in need are able to get paediatric HIV treatments.
sentences.translation: 21%有需要的儿童能够获得儿科艾滋病毒治疗。

sentences.sentence: Prior to the present outbreak in Angola, paediatric cases were considered extremely rare.
sentences.translation: 在安哥拉的最近一次暴发之前，儿科病例被认为极为罕见。
